modName: Sword Art Online Font (No copyright infringement intended)
summary: Hello everyone have you ever played Skyrim and thought this would the perfect game for Sword Art Online Mods. Well so did I unfortunately There are not very many hopefully this inspires people to make more. Introducing Sword Art Online Font replacement. I did not make this only Font I only set up a font replacement mod. (this is also my first mod)
descriptionHtml: Hello everyone have you ever played Skyrim and thought this would the perfect game for Sword Art Online Mods. Well so did I unfortunately There are not very many hopefully this inspires people to make more. Introducing Sword Art Online Font replacement. I did not make this only Font I only set up a font replacement mod. (this is also my first mod ever made) of course since I dont own this it doesn't matter what you do with it but prefereably dont reupload it onto nexus and say that you compiled it together. I do hope that someone can find a way to implement the sword art online user interface though I doubt it. If someone does find it please link me to it.  credits go to: darkblackswords for his/her font at http://darkblackswords.deviantart.com/art/Sword-Art-Online-Font-Download-426603647  and Elite Khajiit for his tutorial https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pdc5NmaA_J0                                                          I did not change every font in the game but i will release seperate versions if you have any specific requests to which default fonts you would like changed then leave a comment.(post)
author: Darkknife
